result.reason: Issue title only — unclear whether the request is about running mRemoteNG.exe itself from a WebDAV-mounted drive, storing connection configs on WebDAV, or a specific error/crash when doing so; need reproduction steps and error details.
result.approach: Ask reporter to clarify: (1) exact failure mode or error message, (2) whether WebDAV is mapped as a drive letter or UNC path, (3) which mRemoteNG version; if a real bug, investigate path handling and .NET network-path restrictions in startup/config-load code.
